name: Still (Ekimoz)
description:
"Still" is an artistic, interactive-puzzle game. "Still" tells a story abot a machine engineer woman and her problems at a daily life.

We made this game in three days for a hackathon. The hackathon's theme was raise awareness for gender equality. So, we've chosen this story to raise awareness for gender equality and draw attention to toxic and sexist behaviours people encounter in their daily lives that may seem harmless from a distance.

Game Developer :Buğra Erkan
Game Developer: Yusuf Kaan Usta
2D Artist: Rüya Eylül Arslan
Narrative Designer: Eda Karalı
Project Manager: Bilge Nesil Baş
Game Designer: Gülcan Özdemir
